name: Sketchbook
description: Hardcover sketchbook with acid-free paper, ideal for drawing, sketching, and doodling.

name: Acrylic Paint Set
description: Set of acrylic paint tubes in assorted colors, suitable for canvas painting, crafts, and art projects.

name: Watercolor Brushes Set
description: Set of watercolor brushes with assorted sizes and shapes, perfect for creating delicate washes and intricate details.

name: Oil Pastels Set
description: Set of oil pastels in rich, vibrant colors, great for blending, layering, and creating textured effects.

name: Drawing Charcoal Set
description: Set of drawing charcoal sticks in assorted hardness grades, ideal for sketching, shading, and tonal studies.

name: Modeling Clay Set
description: Set of colorful modeling clay in assorted colors, perfect for sculpting, molding, and creating 3D artworks.

name: Craft Knife Set
description: Set of precision craft knives with interchangeable blades, suitable for cutting paper, cardboard, and lightweight materials.

name: Canvas Panels Set
description: Set of canvas panels for painting and mixed media artwork, pre-primed and ready to use.

name: Colored Pencil Set
description: Set of colored pencils in assorted colors, ideal for coloring, shading, and blending.

name: Craft Beads Kit
description: Kit of assorted craft beads in various shapes, sizes, and colors, perfect for jewelry making and DIY crafts.
